variable.name: PY25
variable.description: HAVE YOU BEEN EMPLOYED (WORKED FOR MONEY AT LEAST HALF-TIME) MOST OF YOUR ADULT LIFE (18 YEARS OR OLDER)?

variable.name: PY26
variable.description: HOW MANY YEARS HAVE YOU BEEN EMPLOYED AT LEAST HALF-TIME?

variable.name: PY27
variable.description: ARE YOU PRESENTLY:

variable.name: PY28
variable.description: HOW MANY HOURS A WEEK DO YOU WORK OUTSIDE THE HOME?

variable.name: PY33
variable.description: IN THE PAST TEN YEARS, HOW MANY TIMES HAVE YOU CHANGED JOBS?

variable.name: PY34
variable.description: IN THE PAST TEN YEARS, HOW MANY TIMES HAVE YOU CHANGED YOUR LINE OF WORK?

variable.name: PY35
variable.description: IN THE PAST TEN YEARS, HOW MANY TIMES HAVE YOU BEEN PROMOTED?

variable.name: PY102
variable.description: WOULD YOU LIKE VERY MUCH TO HAVE A PAYING JOB?

variable.name: PY103
variable.description: ARE YOU NOW:
variable.value: NOT MARRIED AND NEVER HAVE BEEN
LIVING IN A "MARITAL SITUATION," BUT NOT FORMALLY MARRIED

variable.name: PY104
variable.description: NUMBER OF YEARS LIVING IN A "MARITAL SITUATION"

variable.name: PY105
variable.description: NUMBER OF MONTHS LIVING IN A "MARITAL SITUATION"

variable.name: PY106
variable.description: HOW MANY TIMES HAVE YOU BEEN MARRIED?

variable.name: PY107
variable.description: NUMBER OF YEARS MARRIED (ALL MARRIAGES)

variable.name: PY108
variable.description: NUMBER OF MONTHS MARRIED (ALL MARRIAGES)

variable.name: PY109
variable.description: HOW MANY CHILDREN DO YOU CURRENTLY HAVE?

variable.name: PY121
variable.description: HOW MANY YEARS OF SCHOOL DID YOU ATTEND?

variable.name: PY122
variable.description: HOW MANY YEARS OF SCHOOL DID YOU COMPLETE?

variable.name: PY123
variable.description: WHAT IS THE HIGHEST DEGREE YOU EARNED?

variable.name: PY124
variable.description: WHAT IS YOUR CURRENT PERSONAL INCOME PER YEAR BEFORE TAXES?

variable.name: PY125
variable.description: WHAT IS YOUR CURRENT TOTAL FAMILY INCOME PER YEAR BEFORE TAXES?

variable.name: PY126
variable.description: WHAT WAS YOUR MOTHER'S WORK STATUS MOST OF THE TIME WHEN YOU WERE GROWING UP?
variable.value: WORKED FOR WAGES/SALARY IN THE HOME

variable.name: PY127
variable.description: WOULD YOU SAY YOUR CHANCES OF KEEPING OR ACHIEVING THE TOTAL FAMILY INCOME YOU WOULD LIKE TO HAVE WITHIN THE NEXT 5 TO 10 YEARS ARE:

variable.name: PY128
variable.description: ARE YOU OFTEN TROUBLED BY FEELINGS OF TENSENESS, TIGHTNESS, RESTLESSNESS OR INABILITY TO RELAX? [TENSION SCALE]

variable.name: PY129
variable.description: ARE YOU OFTEN BOTHERED BY NERVOUSNESS OR SHAKING? [TENSION SCALE]

variable.name: PY130
variable.description: DO YOU OFTEN HAVE TROUBLE SLEEPING OR FALLING ASLEEP? [TENSION SCALE]

variable.name: BORTNER
variable.description: BORTNER SCALE (.93=MOST TYPE A) .16-.93 (.93=MOST TYPE A)

variable.name: WKSTRESS
variable.description: WORK STRESS SCALE (.5=MOST STRESS)

variable.name: BOSSUP
variable.description: SUPPORTIVE BOSS SCALE (1=LEAST SUPPORTIVE)

variable.name: SUBORDSP
variable.description: SUPPORTIVE SUBORDINATE SCALE (1=LEAST SUPPORTIVE)

variable.name: COWORKSP
variable.description: SUPPORTIVE COWORKER SCALE (1=LEAST SUPPORTIVE)

variable.name: TENSION
variable.description: TENSION SCALE (1=MOST TENSION)

variable.name: ANXIETY
variable.description: ANXIETY SCALE (1=MOST TENSION)

variable.name: RAGE
variable.description: RAGE SCALE (1=MOST RAGE)

variable.name: HOSTILE
variable.description: HOSTILITY SCALE (1=MOST HOSTILITY)

variable.name: ANGERSYM
variable.description: SYMPTOMS OF ANGER SCALE (1=MOST SYMPTOMS)

variable.name: ANGERIN
variable.description: ANGER-IN SCALE (1=MOST LIKELY TO KEEP ANGER IN)

variable.name: ANGEROUT
variable.description: ANGER-OUT SCALE (1=MOST LIKELY TO LET ANGER OUT)

variable.name: ANGERDIS
variable.description: ANGER DISCUSS SCALE (1=MOST LIKELY TO DISCUSS ANGRY FEELINGS)

variable.name: DEPRESS
variable.description: DEPRESSION SCALE (.85=MOST DEPRESSED)

variable.name: PSYJD
variable.description: PSYCHOLOGICAL JOB DEMANDS SCALE (A KARASEK SCALE) (48=MOST DEMANDING)

variable.name: JOBINSEC
variable.description: JOB INSECURITY SCALE (A KARASEK SCALE) (12=MOST INSECURE)

variable.name: idtype
variable.description: COHORT IDENTIFIER

variable.name: shareid
variable.description: UNIQUE PARTICIPANT ID
